item.title: Part one of two of how to ride a motorcycle yes these videos are a little long, but it’s because I want to cover as much information for you as possible. Show stop your scrolling. Enjoy the video and let me know if I missed anything. #Motorcycle #Motorcyc

item.title: Before we get started learning how to ride let’s talk about what the controls on a motorcycle do. I hope these videos are helpful. My only goal is to help educate and prepare riders to be safe on the road and to have a great time on their motorcycle.#Moto

item.title: In this video, we cover the basics of starting a motorcycle, learning how to avoid a stall, and working through the friction zone of a #motorcycle #motorcycles #clutch ##clutchcontrol##stall

item.title: Let’s talk about shifting for a moment. It’s the thing you’ll end up doing the most next to braking. #motorcycle #motorcycles #motorbike
item.description: Let’s talk about shifting for a moment. It’s the thing you’ll end up doing the most next to braking. #motorcycle #motorcycles #motorbike
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Let’s talk about turning! One of the most fun parts of riding a motorcycle, but for new riders, it can be the most stressful. There’s a lot more turning than I talk about this video, but these are the basics for learning how to maneuver your motorcycle. #
item.description: Let’s talk about turning! One of the most fun parts of riding a motorcycle, but for new riders, it can be the most stressful. There’s a lot more turning than I talk about this video, but these are the basics for learning how to maneuver your motorcycle. #
item.author: cliffy_jr

item.title: Let’s work on braking on a motorcycle. It’s easy to go fast, but learning how to go slow can be a challenge. Hopefully this video makes it a little bit easier. #Motorcycle #Brake #braking

item.title: Getting started on a motorcycle after getting gas. Remember whenever you’re on a motorcycle to check your zipper pockets because for some reason and I can’t tell you why, but those zippers love to come undone the next thing you know for losing your pocket

item.title: If no one told you today, just know that I’m proud of you and I love you and I want only what’s best for you. Stay safe out there and know that you have people that love you and I’m one of them. #Love #Support #Community.

item.title: Getting an escort from the cops down the freeway is a perfect way to spend a ride. These boys know how to move through some traffic. #Motorcycle #Motorcycles #Freeway #LaneSplit

item.title: Congratulations all of those who are saving up to get their first bike or their next bike. You’re gonna have so much fun! Just remember to take it slow and ride your own ride. Speed will come with skill and skill will come with practice. #Motorcycle #Moto

item.title: One thing new riders often struggle with is finding balance in the friction zone. The friction zone is when you lightly pull in the clutch and allow the bike, the ability to gain forward momentum. But if you get out of the friction zone by releasing the c

item.title: Let’s talk about shifting on a motorcycle. There are two way ways to tell when it’s time to shift either up or down when riding a motorcycle. The first is going to be by looking at the RPMs and hearing how loud the bike is. High noise and high RPMs means

item.title: I was really proud of this. I honestly don’t think I can make a better analogy or way of teaching shifting then opening and closing a door and sending someone through and turning off the music. It’s truly some of my best work. #Motorcycle #Shifting #BikeL
item.description: I was really proud of this. I honestly don’t think I can make a better analogy or way of teaching shifting then opening and closing a door and sending someone through and turning off the music. It’s truly some of my best work. #Motorcycle #Shifting #BikeL
